armor.tooltip:
Entity Armor is used to reduce the number of <style="wound">Wounds</style> taken.

If any <style="wound">Damage</style> is done, the entity receives <style="value">1</style> Wound, then the Damage is reduced by the entity's Armor. Take more wounds, reduce by armor, etc. until the damage is reduced to <style="value">0</style>.


If the entity has <style="status">Resistance</style> to the damage <style="value">Element</style> type, then before taking the first <style="wound">Wound</style> the damage is first reduced by the entity's Armor
